price: (24) The companions of Paradise, that Day, are [in] a better settlement and better resting place.
arabic: أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡرٞ مُّسۡتَقَرّٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: aṣḥābu al-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-aḥsanu maqīlan
